page.title: 04TRADE IN THE AREA
page.content: {Trade}in the area. ------------------------------------- Bassingham has always been a community of small freeholders.Today{trade} includes many small family{businesses} and{shops}within the area.Most services are covered and include builders,plumber,carpenter,electrican ,painter and decorator,and an upholsterer and carpet fitter. {Shops}include a general store,dating from before 1841,selling most items of food,gardening and household goods.We have a carpet warehouse where any size of carpet can be purchased.We also have a hairdresser's salon.There are no{shops}in Thurlby and Haddington. Many{mobile shops}visit the area including butchers,greengrocers and coal merchants. --------------------------------------
